Producer: Michael De Luca, E.L. James, Dana Brunetti, Marcus Viscidi
Production Co: Universal Pictures, Perfect World Pictures, Michael De Luca
Rating: R (Some Graphic Nudity|Language|Strong Erotic Sexual Content)
Synopsis: When a wounded Christian Grey tries to entice a cautious Anastasia Steele back into his life, she demands a new arrangement before she will give him another chance. As the two begin to build trust and find stability, shadowy figures from Christian's past start to circle them, determined to destroy their hopes for a future together.
Title: Fifty Shades Darker
